name: Fighter Airplanes at War
description:
{Instructions}

Use the mouse to move your plane. Click to use your cannons to hit other planes. On the top left, you can see your lives and how much money you have. You will notice that it counts by ten. On the top right you will see how many power points you need to upgrade you can also see your power points.  This game can be PC or Mobile. I hope you like it. And it’s possible to get the new shots.

                                                                              {Enemies}

Gray ones take 5 hits.  Blue takes 1. I think purple takes  3. Red might take 3 or 5

Black just touch black and it dies.  White takes 2 hits. That's it please like this game :)

                                                        The difficulty of this game is:

                                                                                  Hard
